tool_description: Checks if a phone number is a valid whatsapp account.
name: Valid Whatsapp
title: Valid Whatsapp

api_list.name: Check phone number.
api_list.description: Enter the number you want to check. Returns `true` or `false`.

required_parameters.description: The whatsapp number must include the country-code.
